public ref class SqlBulkCopy sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 允许你使用其他源的数据有效地批量加载 SQL Server 表。

span.span: Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft SQL Server 包含名为的常用命令提示符实用工具**bcp**将数据从一个表移到另一个，无论它们是在单个服务器或服务器之间。Microsoft SQL Server includes a popular command-prompt utility named **bcp** for moving data from one table to another, whether on a single server or between servers. 类允许你编写托管的代码解决方案，其中提供类似的功能。The class lets you write managed code solutions that provide similar functionality. 还有其他方法将数据加载到 SQL Server 表 （INSERT 语句，例如），但提供性能优势明显超过它们。There are other ways to load data into a SQL Server table (INSERT statements, for example), but offers a significant performance advantage over them. 类只能用于向 SQL Server 表中写入数据。The class can be used to write data only to SQL Server tables. 但是，数据源不是局限于 SQL Server;可以使用任何数据源，只要可以将数据加载到实例，或浏览器进行实例。However, the data source is not limited to SQL Server; any data source can be used, as long as the data can be loaded to a instance or read with a instance. 失败时执行大容量加载类型的列SQL Server 2008 中的类型为日期/时间类型的一个列添加到 SQL Server。 will fail when bulk loading a column of type into a SQL Server column whose type is one of the date/time types added in SQL Server 2008. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何使用 类加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to load data using the class. 在此示例中，用于复制的数据**Production.Product**表中的 SQL Server **AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中类似表的数据库。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the SQL Server **AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. member this.BatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 每个批处理中的行数。

span.span: Number of rows in each batch.

summary.span: 在每个批处理结束时，批处理中的行将发送到服务器。

span.span: At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.

value.span: 属性的整数值；如果未设置任何值，则为零。

span.span: The integer value of the property, or zero if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当批已完成行被处理或没有更多的行发送到目标数据源。A batch is complete when rows have been processed or there are no more rows to send to the destination data source. 零 （默认值），每个表示操作是单个批次。Zero (the default) indicates that each operation is a single batch. 如果实例已经声明，但选项有效时，将行发送到服务器执行时间，但不与事务相关的操作的行。If the instance has been declared without the option in effect, rows are sent to the server rows at a time, but no transaction-related action is taken. 如果有效时，是作为单独的事务插入的行的每个批。If is in effect, each batch of rows is inserted as a separate transaction. 属性可以设置在任何时间。The property can be set at any time. 如果大容量复制已在进行中，当前批处理的大小根据上一批大小。If a bulk copy is already in progress, the current batch is sized according to the previous batch size. 后续批处理都将使用新的大小。Subsequent batches use the new size. 如果最初为零的和已更改时操作已在进行中，操作将作为单个批处理数据加载。If the is initially zero and changed while a operation is already in progress, that operation loads the data as a single batch. 任何后续上相同的操作实例使用的新。Any subsequent operations on the same instance use the new . ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量的 50 行批量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data in batches of 50 rows. 示例说明如何适用于事务，请参阅[事务和大容量复制操作](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For an example illustrating how works with a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md). 在此示例中，源数据首先读取到的 SQL Server 表实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 超时之前可用于完成操作的秒数。

span.span: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.
The integer value of the property.
The default is 30 seconds.

value.span: 值为 0 表示无限制，大容量复制将无限期等待。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该操作会超时，事务已提交并不从目标表中删除所有复制的行。If the operation does time out, the transaction is not committed and all copied rows are removed from the destination table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示了如何修改为 60 秒的超时值时大容量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to modify the time-out to 60 seconds when bulk loading data. 在此示例中，源数据首先读取到的 SQL Server 表实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后上对象，任何其他操作将会成功。After you call a on the object, no other operation will succeed. 调用方法将引发。Calls to the method will throw an . 调用方法从事件会导致引发。Calling the method from the event causes an to be thrown. 请注意，打开实例的结尾处隐式关闭`using`块。Note that open instances are closed implicitly at the end of a `using` block. ## Examples 下面的示例使用相同实例将销售订单和其关联的详细信息添加到两个目标表。The following example uses the same instance to add sales orders and their associated details to two destination tables. 因为**AdventureWorks**销售订单表很大，示例读取仅发出的某一特定帐号的订单并大容量将这些订单和详细信息复制到目标表。Because the **AdventureWorks** sales order tables are large, the sample reads only orders placed by a certain account number and bulk copies those orders and details to the destination tables. 只有这两个大容量复制操作完成之后才能使用方法。The method is used only after both bulk copy operations are complete. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.OrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.OrdersDetails/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.OrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.OrdersDetails/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 列映射定义数据源中的列和目标中的列之间的关系。

span.span: Column mappings define the relationships between columns in the data source and columns in the destination.
A collection of column mappings.
By default, it is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据源和目标表具有相同数目的列，且数据源中每个源列的序号位置匹配的相应目标列的序号位置是不必要的集合。If the data source and the destination table have the same number of columns, and the ordinal position of each source column within the data source matches the ordinal position of the corresponding destination column, the collection is unnecessary. 但是，如果列计数不同，或不一致的序号位置，则必须使用以确保数据复制到正确的列。However, if the column counts differ, or the ordinal positions are not consistent, you must use to make sure that data is copied into the correct columns. 在大容量复制操作的执行期间可以访问此集合，但不能更改。During the execution of a bulk copy operation, this collection can be accessed, but it cannot be changed. 任何尝试对其进行更改会引发。Any attempt to change it will throw an .

you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于说明大容量复制操作的进度的用户界面组件。This property is designed for user interface components that illustrate the progress of a bulk copy operation. 它指示要在生成通知事件之前要处理的行数。It indicates the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event. 大容量复制操作正在进行时甚至可以在任何时候，设置属性。The property can be set at any time, even while a bulk copy operation is underway. 下一步通知之后，大容量复制操作期间所做的更改才会生效。Changes made during a bulk copy operation take effect after the next notification. 新的设置适用于在同一实例上的所有后续操作。The new setting applies to all subsequent operations on the same instance. 如果已设为的数字小于零，则引发。If is set to a number less than zero, an is thrown. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载数据使用已打开的连接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 属性设置，以便复制到表中每个 50 行后调用的事件处理程序。The property is set so that the event handler is called after every 50 rows copied to the table. 在此示例中，使用的连接是首先从到的 SQL Server 表中读取数据实例。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 然后，会打开第二个连接用于大容量复制数据。Then a second connection is opened to bulk copy the data. 请注意，源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复制操作开始于读取器中的下一个可用行。The copy operation starts at the next available row in the reader. 大多数情况下，只需返回的读取器或类似的调用，因此下一个可用行是第一行。Most of the time, the reader was just returned by or a similar call, so the next available row is the first row. 若要处理多个结果，请调用上的数据读取器和调用试。To process multiple results, call on the data reader and call again. 请注意，使用修改的读取器的状态。Note that using modifies the state of the reader. 该方法将调用直到它返回 false，中止操作，或发生错误。The method will call until it returns false, the operation is aborted, or an error occurs. 这意味着数据读取器将在不同的状态下，可能的结果集末尾时操作已完成。This means that the data reader will be in a different state, probably at the end of the result set, when the operation is complete. 大容量复制操作正在进行，关联的目标时是繁忙的服务，并可以在连接上执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合从数据读取器将列映射到目标数据库表。The collection maps from the data reader columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载数据从。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data from a . 目标表是中的表**AdventureWorks**数据库。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 仅将与提供的 中提供的行状态匹配的行复制到 对象的 属性指定的目标表。

span.span: Copies only rows that match the supplied row state in the supplied to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在行中所示的状态`rowState`参数，并且不删除复制到目标表。Only rows in the that are in the states indicated in the `rowState` argument and have not been deleted are copied to the destination table. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定，则任何， ，和行也将被复制到服务器。If is specified, any , , and rows will also be copied to the server. 将引发异常。No exception will be raised. 大容量复制操作正在进行，关联的目标时是繁忙的服务，并可以在连接上执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合将映射从到目标数据库表的列。The collection maps from the columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示了如何进行大容量加载中的行匹配指定的状态。The following Console application demonstrates how to bulk load only the rows in a that match a specified state. 在这种情况下，仅不变的行已添加。In this case, only unchanged rows are added. 目标表是中的表**AdventureWorks**数据库。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此示例中，创建在运行的时和三个行添加到其中。In this example, a is created at run time and three rows are added to it. 之前执行方法，这些行之一编辑。Before the method is executed, one of the rows is edited. 与调用方法`DataRowState.Unchanged``rowState`参数，因此，只有两个不变的行是大容量复制到目标。The method is called with a `DataRowState.Unchanged` `rowState` argument, so only the two unchanged rows are bulk copied to the destination. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例将不运行，除非你已创建的工作表中所述[大容量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码演示了使用语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例，则更容易且更快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Performing Bulk Copy Operations
ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 的异步版本，它将所有行从数据源复制到 对象的 属性指定的目标表。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which copies all rows from a data source to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个活动结果集 (MARS) 已禁用，建立连接正忙。If multiple active result sets (MARS) is disabled, makes the connection busy. 如果启用了 MARS，你可以交错调用与同一个连接中的其他命令。If MARS is enabled, you can interleave calls to with other commands in the same connection. 当其中一个出现故障时回滚的行数取决于多项操作：The number of rows that are rolled back when one fails depends on several things: - 如果指定。If is specified. - 如果你有自己的事务。If you have your own transaction. - 的值。The value of . 将数据发送到服务器，当前批处理时出现错误时 (根据) 将被回滚。When there is an error while sending data to the server, the current batch (as specified by ) will be rolled back. 如果未指定，并且具有自己的事务，则整个事务将回滚 （其中包括所有以前批）。If is not specified and you have your own transaction, the entire transaction will be rolled back (which includes all previous batches as well). 使用要知道多少行已复制到服务器。Use to know how many rows were copied to the server.
